allQuestion.explanation: Wondering if the two of you are fated to be with one another? Find out how strong your soul mate energy is...
allQuestion.text: Do you ever sense each other's feelings, say the same thing at the same time, or other cross-over things like texting out of the blue at the same time?

allQuestion.explanation: Wondering if the two of you are fated to be with one another? Find out how strong your soul mate energy is...

answers.text: Out at a bar, club, event, dating site/app, or other place where the goal was to meet someone.
Through friends or family, work, or school.
On an errand, vacation, or place where meeting someone was unexpected.

allQuestion.explanation: Wondering if the two of you are fated to be with one another? Find out how strong your soul mate energy is...

answers.text: Many. We enjoy doing some things together, others we'd rather do with friends or by ourselves.
Basically everything. We are so alike, it's a bit creepy.
A couple. There's a lot of things we don't really enjoy or understand that the other loves.

allQuestion.text: How many shared interests do you have?

allQuestion.explanation: Wondering if the two of you are fated to be with one another? Find out how strong your soul mate energy is...
allQuestion.text: Pick the one word that best describes the way your beloved makes you feel.
